content: facing and after completing both front and back panels 1 begin at the start of the front panel where the working yarn is - knit across all front panel stitches 2 left underarm setup between front and back - cable cast on 10 11 12 12 13 14 15 16 sts - place marker this marks the left side seam centered in the underarm - cable cast on another 10 11 12 13 13 14 15 16 sts total underarm co 20 22 24 25 26 28 30 32 sts 3 knit across all back panel stitches 4 right underarm setup - cable cast on 10 11 12 12 13 14 15 16 sts - place marker this marks the right side seam and also becomes the new beginning of round - cable cast on another 10 11 12 13 13 14 15 16 sts 5 join in the round - slip 1 stitch from lh to rh needle - pass the second stitch over the first to secure the join - begin knitting in the round from the right side seam marker now the beginning of round m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl back panel - co 78 86 94 98 102 112 122 132 sts using i-cord cast on - work in slipped-stitch edge pattern row 1 k1 sl1 wyif k to last 2 sts sl1 wyif k1 row 2 sl1 wyif k1 sl1 wyif p to last 3 sts sl1 wyif k1 sl1 wyif until back measures 6 25 6 25 6 5 6 5 6 75 6 75 7 7 from cast-on edge front panel - pick up and knit 20 22 24 25 26 28 30 33 sts from right back edge - pm co 100 110 120 124 128 138 148 158 sts using cable cast on pm co 1 more st - pick up and knit 20 22 24 25 26 28 30 33 sts from left back edge - slip 2nd stitch over last to join neckline shaping all sizes begin with total front stitches after pickup and cast-on - xs 141 sts - s 155 sts - m 169 sts - l 175 sts - xl 179 sts - 2xl 195 sts - 3xl 209 sts - 4xl 225 sts work decreases to shape neckline - decrease 44 48 52 56 60 64 68 72 sts total - repeat the following 2 row 22 24 26 28 30 32 34 36 times row a rs k1 sl1 wyif k to marker sm ssk k to 2 before marker k2tog sm k to last 2 sts sl1 wyif k1 row b ws sl1 wyif k1 sl1 wyif p to last 3 sts sl1 wyif k1 sl1 wyif remaining stitches after shaping - xs 97 - s 107 - m 117 - l 119 - xl 119 - 2xl 131 - 3xl 141 - 4xl 153 then continue working row a and b without further decreases until front panel measures 6 25 6
